snippet.title: How to get free Starbucks today
snippet.content:
is giving away free drinks to Macchiato lovers.
From 2 p.m. to 5 p.m., Starbucks is giving customers a free Macchiato when they purchase a Macchiato beverage.
The deal starts Thursday, August 3 and lasts until Monday, August 7.
Starbucks is highlighting its iced Macchiato selections, including the new Iced Coconutmilk Mocha Macchiato and the Iced Cinnamon Almondmilk Macchiato.
